message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price more around $80. Could you consider that?
I understand that $80 is a great starting point, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $85. Would you be willing to go down to $82?
I'm willing to meet you halfway again, Bob! I can do $83. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I still think I can get a better deal. Would you be willing to go down to $80?
